general.gigTitle: design and develop a full wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Web Application Developer and Wordpress Specialist
sellerCard.description: I am a dedicated full-time freelancer with over 5 years of expertise in WordPress design and development. Throughout my career, I have successfully completed over 500 projects across various platforms, earning the trust and satisfaction of numerous clients. My commitment to delivering high-quality work and innovative solutions sets me apart in the world of web development. If you're seeking a seasoned professional with a proven track record, I'm here to turn your web projects into outstanding successes.

description.content:
From e-commerce to web development & design services, we do everything in between. You will definitely love the website we will develop & design for you. Hire us for your next project and get your web design & developed within your time and budget.


What features you can expect from my gig?


  • Easy and User Friendly Admin panel
  • Drag n Drop Builder for Easy Editing
  • Responsive Design
  • SEO Optimized
  • Fast Loading Speed
  • High level Security 


Why choose me ?


  • Unlimited Revisions until you are completely satisfied
  • Money Back Guarantee , if you are not satisfied
  • Live Development Progress on Staging Server
  • 7+ Years Of Experience


EXTRAS


-> Free Migration to your Server

-> Easy Guide on how to edit the content



NOTE :- 

- Inbox me for FREE CONSULTATION

- Contact Me Before Ordering to Avoid Any Inconvenience

slide.name: design and develop a full wordpress website
design and develop a full wordpress website
design and develop a full wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do we get started ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: As every project has different requirements so Before placing the order , it is highly recommended to have a conversation so we can create the requirements and plan for you .

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are the requirements to create a site ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need all the content ready before we start with couple of reference websites that you like , so i can have the better idea what type of design / layout / features you want . If you do not have the content ready we can built website with dummy content, and you can later replace it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What login credentials do you need ?
Can i edit the content myself ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure , The website will be created using very easy to use drag n drop builder called ELEMENTOR , You will be able to make changes easily without any technical knowledge

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are the steps to create a site ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: After you order , i will start working on my staging server . You can check the live progress of your development from there . Once the website is completed and approved by you , it will be transferred to your hosting .

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer Unlimited Revisions ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes , you will be provided with unlimited revisions until you are fully satisfied .

reviews.comment: Great design of pages. Beautiful E commerce integration. I am loving the results of theme, layout & esthetic.  He is also very helpful especially the video explanations he provides. Highly recommended!!!
He’s great to work with! Always there even after the order was completed to answer questions. Communication is great and does exactly what’s needed. My site looks amazing!

Faraz B. exceeded my expectations in every way! His professionalism and attention to detail truly stand out. Working with him was a breeze – he was fluent, timely, and went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect. 👍

Faraz B. did an OUTSTANDING job on my project—completely bug-free, well-documented, and beyond expectations! He was polite, quick to respond, and clear in communication throughout the process. Highly recommend working with him! 🙌
